description:
A teapot holds a dark secret.  A man solves a complicated riddle.  A complex pun involving tea and sieves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bunbuku Chagama / Mukoiri no Nanmon / Sannin no Akindo
The Teapot Raccoon / The Difficult Marriage Question / Three Merchants
ぶんぶく茶釜 / 婿入りの難問 / 三人の商人
